mapper.content:
MECHANICAL ALERT
Vehicle / Equipment Issue Reported
Worker: {{ifempty(1.WorkerID; "Unknown")}}  •  Caller: {{ifempty(1.From; emptystring)}}  •  Severity: {{ifempty(1.Severity; "—")}}
SUPPORT CONTACTS
Use in-shop first; escalate to on-call if unavailable.
AI Summary
{{if(length(ifempty(1.AI_Summary; emptystring)) > 0; ifempty(1.AI_Summary; emptystring); if(length(ifempty(1.SpeechResult; emptystring)) > 160; substring(ifempty(1.SpeechResult; emptystring); 0; 160) & "..."; ifempty(1.SpeechResult; emptystring)))}}
Transcription
{{ifempty(1.SpeechResult; emptystring)}}
Mechanics
• {{ifempty(22.`1`; "In-Shop Mechanic")}} — {{ifempty(22.`2`; emptystring)}} — {{ifempty(22.`3`; emptystring)}}
• {{ifempty(27.`1`; "External Mechanic (On-Call)")}} — {{ifempty(27.`2`; emptystring)}} — {{ifempty(27.`3`; emptystring)}}
Towing
• {{ifempty(23.`1`; "Towing (P1)")}} — {{ifempty(23.`2`; emptystring)}} — {{ifempty(23.`3`; emptystring)}}
• {{ifempty(28.`1`; "Towing (P2)")}} — {{ifempty(28.`2`; emptystring)}} — {{ifempty(28.`3`; emptystring)}}
• {{ifempty(29.`1`; "Towing (P3)")}} — {{ifempty(29.`2`; emptystring)}} — {{ifempty(29.`3`; emptystring)}}

mapper.subject: 🔧 MECHANICAL: {{ifempty(1.WorkerID; "Unknown")}} — Action Required

mapper.content:
LIABILITY / UNKNOWN CALLER
Liability Flag — Review Required
Worker: {{ifempty(1.WorkerID; "Unknown")}}  •  Caller: {{ifempty(1.From; emptystring)}}  •  Severity: {{ifempty(1.Severity; "—")}}
URGENT REVIEW REQUIRED
Open the recording first, then confirm severity + next action.
AI Summary
{{ifempty(1.AI_Summary; emptystring)}}
(If blank, AI Summary is not available yet — use the transcription below.)
Transcription
{{ifempty(1.SpeechResult; emptystring)}}
Required actions
• Identify caller in Roster_Master (if unknown)
• Pull Emergency Contact link for the worker (Roster_Master)
• If injury suspected: start NYSIF packet + incident documentation
View Emergency Contact (Roster) (if available)
NYSIF — Workers’ Comp Resources
▶ Listen to Recording
RK Field Reporting • Liability & Safety

spec.help: The HTTPS URL that hosts the image.

spec.help:
The wrap text setting.
If `true`, the text wraps and displays on multiple lines.
Otherwise, the text is truncated.
Only applies to `Text`, not `Top Label` and `BottomLabel`.
spec.name: wrapText
spec.label: Wrap Text

spec.help:
The text that appears above Text.
Always truncates.
spec.name: topLabel
spec.label: Top Label

spec.help:
The text that appears below Text.
Always truncates.
spec.name: bottomLabel
spec.label: Bottom Label

spec.help: A switch widget can be clicked to change its state and trigger an action.
spec.name: switchControl

spec.help: The value entered by a user, returned as part of a form input event.
